tasks.label: Start static server (8080)
tasks.command: if (Get-Command py -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { py -m http.server 8080 } elseif (Get-Command python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { python -m http.server 8080 } else { Write-Error 'Python not found'; exit 1 }

tasks.label: Stop static server (8080)
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 8080 -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_ -Force }"
